_metadata.description: Lighthouse performance and accessibility requirements for browser-automation-studio

requirements.title: Dashboard loads with acceptable performance score
requirements.description: Home page (dashboard) must achieve Lighthouse performance score of 0.75+ on desktop. This ensures users experience fast initial load and time-to-interactive for the primary entry point.

requirements.title: Dashboard meets WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility standards
requirements.description: Dashboard page achieves Lighthouse accessibility score of 0.90+, ensuring keyboard navigation, screen reader support, color contrast, and ARIA labeling meet WCAG 2.1 AA standards.

requirements.title: Workflow builder becomes interactive within acceptable timeframe
requirements.description: Workflow builder page achieves Lighthouse performance score of 0.65+. Lower threshold accounts for heavy Monaco editor and React Flow canvas initialization. Focus on Time to Interactive (TTI) and Total Blocking Time (TBT).

validation.notes: Lower threshold due to canvas + Monaco editor. Focus on interactivity metrics.

requirements.title: Projects page loads efficiently
requirements.description: Projects listing/management page achieves Lighthouse performance score of 0.75+, ensuring fast navigation between projects.

requirements.title: Mobile UI meets accessibility standards
requirements.description: Mobile viewport maintains Lighthouse accessibility score of 0.90+, ensuring touch targets, viewport configuration, and responsive design maintain accessibility on mobile devices.
